resources.string:
All apps created by me are just for my learning and personal uses purpose. If you found them useful then you can use them, but I will not be responsible for any kind of problem occurred by them.

I have tested all my apps on emulator and my own device. I will never publish any app publicly until I fixed every known bugs.

Still you find any kind of bug or error you can freely let me know about that so that I can fix it in next version. You can mail me at: wonder_a7@yahoo.co.in 

Thanks and regards
